title: Acts 2:1-12
description: Scripture reference used in FCT Module 4

content.contextInModule: Pentecost (Acts 2:1-12) \- The story of Pentecost, where the Holy Spirit enables the apostles to speak in different tongues, symbolizes breaking down communication barriers, analogous to the goal of technology in enhancing understanding and cooperation among diverse groups.
